author: Stuart Radnedge|published in gasworld magazine
title: In focus...Medical and healthcare equipment
text:
In focus...Medical and healthcare equipment 30 Sep 2015 | By Stuart Radnedge , published in gasworld magazine 
We are born. We live, and then we die. Central to all of these stages of life is the medical and healthcare sector. For this reason alone, it can be no surprise that this section of the industrial gases business is booming. A number of high value acquisitions from Tier One companies in the healthcare sector are responsible for significant financial performance boosts, as Stuart Radnedge explores.
